title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, pancetta and pepper.
ingredients: Salt and freshly ground black pepper
steps: Boil the spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Fry the pancetta until crispy, then add garlic and cook briefly.
Beat eggs in a bowl and mix with grated cheeses.
Drain pasta, reserving a little cooking water.
Combine pasta with pancetta and remove from heat.
Quickly stir in the egg and cheese mixture, adding pasta water if needed for creaminess.
Season with salt and plenty of black pepper, then serve immediately.

title: Vegetarian Chili
description: A hearty, spicy chili packed with vegetables and beans.
steps: Sauté onion and garlic in a large pot until softened.
Add bell pepper and zucchini; cook until slightly tender.
Stir in chili powder, cumin, and smoked paprika; cook until fragrant.
Add beans and diced tomatoes; simmer for 20–30 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper and serve with your favorite toppings.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Classic chewy and buttery chocolate chip cookies with a hint of vanilla.
steps: Combine flour, baking soda, and salt in a small bowl.
Beat butter, sugars, and vanilla until creamy; add eggs one at a time.
Gradually add flour mixture; stir in chocolate chips.
Drop rounded tablespoons of dough onto baking sheets.
Bake for 9–11 minutes or until golden brown; cool on wire racks.
